rules_text:
{T}: Mill two cards, then exile up to one instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Until end of turn, you may cast a copy of that card. Activate only on your turn.
[i]Deep Dwelling[/i]– Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, untap this creature if your main library contains a number of cards less than or equal to half your starting deck size.
